channel.title: Please help with a emote :)
channel.description:
Hey, Please could someone help me by telling me what code i need to add the ::god emote to my server?
I no it goes into client.java and i no the emote code is 1501. Ive added a few commands befour but not any emotes so im not sure on the code.
All help appreciated Thankyou, Jake :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2009, 02:34:31 pm[/size][hr]Anyone know? Sorry for rushing but im in quite abit of a rush hehe :D

item.title: Please help with a emote :)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“jake_93, post:3, topic:290482”]Im getting this:
"client.java:8361: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable(int)
location: class client
if (command.equalsisignorecase(“god”)){variable(1501);

1 error"

Also if you could tell me how to make it so only admins+ can use it (i tried adding &&playerrights= 2
but added another error.

Jake :D[/quote]
You replace the word variable with the actual variable.

Read full topic
